What are the genetic changes related to thiopurine S-methyltransferase deficiency ?,"TPMT deficiency results from changes in the TPMT gene. This gene provides instructions for making the TPMT enzyme, which plays a critical role in breaking down (metabolizing) thiopurine drugs.
